narrative.title: 15 Panzer Division - 1941Q4
narrative.situation: German Armored Division (Panzer-Division) deployed in North Africa during 1941Q4.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored strike force for offensive operations and counterattacks
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
